mapper.select: select m.member_name, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_views, p.created_date, p.updated_date, p.post_status from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id join tbl_comment c on p.id = c.post_id and p.post_status = 'active' order by p.created_date desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from tbl_post where post_status = 'active'
